name: Haley
descriptions: Haley is a local inhabitant of Point Lookout and the owner and proprietor of Haley's Hardware. He appears in the Fallout 3 add-on Point Lookout.

Little is known about Haley's past, even by himself. Apparently suffering from amnesia, his earliest clear memory is from around 2275, waking up in the run-down shop he presently owns, but over time he learned not to be bothered by it. Instead, Haley saw fit to continue living in the store since most of it was already stocked; even his own name was borrowed from the pre-War signage. Once other Point Lookout locals started flocking to his shop, he settled into life as a trader, providing goods and offering services with his repair skills.

Haley eventually developed a mutual understanding with the resident swampfolk, who leave him in peace whenever they visit despite typically being hostile to everyone else; Haley believes this has to do with him being a native of the area, though it probably also helps that he is willing to exchange food with them.
Haley sits in his shop all day selling goods to anyone that comes by.
* A bug allows this to reach the maximum 100; see below
Haley appears only in the Fallout 3 add-on Point Lookout.

topics.topic_text: I wanted to talk about you, Haley.
topics.response_text: There's not much to tell. What do you want to know?
No, no. Not at all! I'm just not used to people all the way out here.
The swamp folk, mostly. I guess they don't bother me none because I was born here.

topics.topic_text: So, how long have you had this store?
topics.response_text: Oh, you're thinking... no, no. It's not a family thing. I took the name of the store when I found this place a couple years ago.

topics.topic_text: Where do you get your stock from?
topics.response_text: I found some of it. Some was here when I got here. I get some from them smugglers.
Sure thing. Are you here to buy something?
No, no. Not at all! I'm just not used to people all the way out here.

topics.topic_text: Can you repair some things for me?
topics.response_text: Sure as a swamp folk's head is squishy.

topics.topic_text: Show me what you have for sale.

topics.response_text: Well, hello there! Welcome to... uh... welcome to Haley's Hardware! Where we have... hard... ware...

conversation.response_text: Be careful out there. Them swamp folk is nasty.
I also can do repairs, if'n you need it.
